articles.author: Debora Patta
articles.title: Oscar Pistorius denied parole a decade after murdering girlfriend Reeva Steenkamp in South Africa - CBS News
articles.description: Arriving for the parole hearing, Reeva Steenkamp's mother said she was against any early release for their daughter's killer, whom she said had "never" shown real remorse.
articles.content: Johannesburg — Former Olympic runner and Paralympic gold medalist Oscar Pistorius was again denied parole on Friday. South Africa's parole board issued the ruling, keeping Pistorius jailed more than … [+3274 chars]
